item.description:
Laser tag, if you haven't already tried it, is simple and fun shoot-em-up style action game. Much like Paintball, you pick your weapon, choose your opponents and hunt them down. Only, unlike Paintball, there's no paint, no pellets and no mess.

What you do get is high-octane fun that'll make you want more and more!

I've been to Laser Quest in Danvers before and it was a whole lot of fun. The guns are simple to use, the facility is really good for playing hide-and-seek Rambo-style, and for $8.50 it's a steal.

What: Laser tag
Where: Laser Quest, Danvers
When: 09 Jan 2010
Cost: $8.50

One more thing: carpooling can be arranged, just indicate in your RSVP or in the comments section.
item.name: Laser Tag
